metadata.title: CVE-2022-31618 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: NVIDIA vGPU software contains a vulnerability in the Virtual GPU Manager(vGPU plugin), where it can dereference a null pointer, which may lead todenial of service.

criterions.comment: nvidia-graphics-drivers-304: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
